channel.title: Opening ports in firewall?
channel.description: how do i open ports in firewall? the ultimate guide said he went to control panel settings then add port. tried doing the same thing got to control panel and i didnt know were settings are. so pretty much i just need to know how to open ports in firewall i guess. help a noob?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 30, 2007, 09:54:48 PM[/size][hr]do i go to internet connections then click: "change settings of this connection" on the side ?
